Putting you in control.

Security at every stage.

Putting you in control.Security at every stage.

Self-custody wallet

Funds in the wallet are exclusively held and managed by the user. You are in
complete control over your crypto assets.

Powered by MPC

Advanced multi-party computation (MPC) technology creates three separately
stored ‘key shares’. Enjoy unparalleled security without the need for a seed
phrase.

Learn More![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/image/julia/web-mpc-wallet/chevron-
right-f.svg)

Built-in risk controls

Get alerts if a token or blockchain carries security risks, including wrong
address protection or malicious contract detection.

may go down or up and you may not get back the amount invested. You are solely
responsible for your investment decisions and Binance is not liable for any
losses you may incur. APR is an estimate of rewards you will earn in
cryptocurrency over the selected timeframe. It does not display the actual or
predicted returns/yield in any fiat currency. APR is adjusted daily and the
estimated rewards may differ from the actual rewards generated. For selected
staking products, Binance takes on all slashing risk. This means that the same
amount of digital assets staked will be returned to you, even if they are
slashed. Not financial advice. For more information, see our Terms of Use and
Risk Warning.

Multi-Party Computation (MPC)![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/image/julia/web-
mpc-wallet/close-f.svg)

Binance Web3 Wallet uses advanced multi-party computation (MPC) technology.
This means you can enjoy a self-custody wallet experience without the need for
a seed phrase. MPC allows the creation of a secure key management system
without a single point of failure. For a standard wallet this would be losing
your seed phrase.

Instead, Binance Web3 Wallet is secured by three key-shares and a recovery
password solely known to the user. These key-shares are generated when you
create the wallet and stored in different locations for added security:

  * Share 1: Secured by Binance;
  * Share 2: Stored on your device;
  * Share 3: Encrypted by the recovery password you entered, and backed up to your personal cloud storage (iCloud or Google Drive).

Please note that backing up Share 3 is mandatory before using the wallet. To
access your wallet, you must have at least two key-shares.

LayerSwap

Satori finance

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/marinade_logo1.png)

Marinade

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/syncswap.png)

SyncSwap

SyncSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) on zkSync Era

![](https://public.bnbstatic.com/client_upload/dc/RYCUjq8LMhQsx4amgUcXW8/20240324/ipKeZeuMptq6MMMBq8Ku4X.svg)

Cellula Game Of Life

Cellula is a full-chain game that cleverly integrates game theory mechanisms,
offering endless combinations of life forms and precise algorithmic support.
It employs a unique virtual proof-of-work (vPOW) asset allocation method,
injecting more creativity into the game and providing a sustainable incentive
mechanism for the games and applications built within the ecosystem.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/cyber8ball.png)

Cyber8ball

1

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/lifeform.png)

LifeForm

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/client_upload/dc/RYCUjq8LMhQsx4amgUcXW8/20240326/79YtrUHt8Kt8SkvKz3RRYR.svg)

Kinza Finance

Kinza Finance is the next-generation decentralized lending protocol on BNB
Chain and opBNB. Kinza Finance is non-custodial, permissionless, secure, and
incorporates cutting-edge DeFi mechanisms and solutions to offer users a
flexible and highly customizable DeFi lending experience. Built-in mechanisms
and rewards incentivize participation, and innovative tokenomics ensure
unparalleled sustainability.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/cry.png)

CryptoMaze

CryptoMaze is a hub for FUN interactive digital experiences - connecting
Gamers, Brands, Creators & Communities on Zksync.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/nova.png)

zkLink Nova

The first Aggregated Layer 3 Rollup zkEVM network that brings unprecedented
liquidity and asset aggregation to Ethereum and its Layer 2 Rollups.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/client_upload/dc/RYCUjq8LMhQsx4amgUcXW8/20240326/btQTouy4MRDnVTqUMMFX3A.svg)

Link3

Link3 is a Web3 native social platform built on CyberConnect protocol.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/carv.png)

Carv

Empower users with data self-sovereignty and share value captured from the
utility of data in a consent-based, privacy-preserving mechanism.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/zorro.png)

Zorro

Zorro is a gamefi platform on zkSync Era.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/sato.png)

Satoshi Protocol

Satoshi Protocol is the first CDP built on BTC Layer 2, it allows investors to
deposit BTC and borrow stablecoin $SAT, Unleash trillion dollars of BTCFi.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/omni.png)

OmniBTC

OmniBTC is an omnichain DeFi platform that connects all the on-chain liquidity
using interoperability protocols.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/bevm.png)

BEVM Bridge

BEVM is a decentralized EVM-compatible #BTClayer2 based on #Taproot, and using
$BTC as gas.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/aveai.png)

Ave.ai

1 Stop Onchain Trading Terminal

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/layerbank.png)

LayerBank

LayerBank is a project with high and unlock scalability limits by seamlessly
integrating with various EVM rollups and Layer 2 chains.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/angel.png)

Angle Protocol

Angle is a decentralized protocol developing leading stablecoin systems.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/aqua.png)

Aqua

It is a decentralized automated market maker, bringing powerful extra features
to the DeFi space including native liquidity locking.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/zkdx.png)

zkDX

A cutting-edge derivatives exchange of liquidity mode built on L2 networks.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/pendle.png)

Pendle

The Pendle protocol enables permissionless tokenization and trading of yield.
Pendle allows users to obtain fixed yield and trade/speculate future Defi
yield.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/mega.png)

BounceBit Megadrop

BounceBit Megadrop offers a guaranteed principal and 2.5% APR. Earn yield and
receive BounceBit BTC LSD for restaking. Start with just 0.0001 BTCB, watch
your assets grow.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/mode.png)

Mode Network

Mode is the Ethereum L2 that rewards you for growing the network via new
economic mechanisms. Powered by Optimism.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/stake.png)

Stakestone

StakeStone is an omni-chain LST (Liquid Staking Token) protocol aiming to
bring native staking yields and liquidity to Layer 2s in a decentralized
manner.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/merkle.png)

Merkle Trade

The first-ever gamified perp DEX. Trade, level up and unlock instant rewards.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/tabi.png)

Tabi Testnet

Modular Cosmos gaming L1 with any-VM-compatibility.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/bungee.png)

Bungee Exchange

Bungee is a bridge aggregator that provides seamless bridging across chains.
It aggregates all bridges, DEXs, and DEX Aggregators to offer the best
product.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/debridge.png)

deBridge

deBridge is a secure interoperability layer for Web3 that enables
decentralized transfers of arbitrary messages and value between various
blockchains.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/cbridge.png)

cBridge

Celer cBridge is a decentralized and non-custodial asset bridge that supports
token transfer across 40+ blockchains and layer-2 rollups.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/meth.png)

mETH by mantle

A permissionless, non-custodial ETH liquid staking protocol deployed on
Ethereum L1 and governed by Mantle.

![](https://bin.bnbstatic.com/static/buw/icons/merlin.png)

Merlin

Merlin Chain is a Bitcoin Layer 2 that integrates the ZK-Rollup network,
decentralized oracle network, Data Availability, and on-chain BTC fraud proof
modules.
